article.description: Jeremy Major scored 16 points and Amadi Udenyi sank a key 3-pointer late in the second half to lift Pepperdine to a 66-65 win over Arkansas-Little Rock on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Pepperdine edges past Little Rock 66-65
article.story: MALIBU, Calif. -- Jeremy Major scored 16 points and Amadi Udenyi sank a key 3-pointer late in the second half to lift Pepperdine to a 66-65 win over Arkansas-Little Rock on Tuesday night. Chris Reyes scored six points and Udenyi hit a 3-pointer during a 9-0 run that gave Pepperdine (4-1) a 45-43 lead with 13:29 to go and the Waves didn't trail again. Little Rock (3-2) got a tip-in from Lis Shoshi with 1:46 left to tie it at 63-all, before Udenyi hit his third 3 of the night to put Pepperdine on top for good. Shoshi tightened the gap with a final layup but Little Rock missed three shots down the stretch. Reyes added 14 points on 7-for-10 shooting and grabbed 10 rebounds for Pepperdine, which shot 51 percent from the field. Shoshi finished with 16 points and 10 rebounds for Little Rock.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.
